I am an Associate Professor at the Computer Institute of the Federal University of Bahia (UFBA). I obtained my Doctor of Sciences degree in Systems and Computer Engineering, with emphasis on Computer Graphics, at PESC/COPPE , Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ), Brazil. My research interest is in Computer Graphics, with focus on 3D Modeling, Real-Time Rendering, Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR).
